data.name: Retro Synthwave
data.detailed_description:
Retro Synthwave aka the ’80s


If your goal is to create Synthwave, Synthpop, Retrowave, Vapourwave, Chillwave and other similar genres, then with this DLC, Rytmik Studio will be just the tool to let you do it.

  • Over 250 authentic samples created and selected specially for synthwave
  • ’80s Drums
  • Electronic percussion
  • Classic synthesizer bass
  • Wide selection of melodic and accompanying synthetic instruments
  • New "Tape" master effect–simulating magnetic tape sound to instantly give your track the appropriate retro feel
  • 9 new unlocked demo songs

Synthwave (also called outrun, retrowave, or futuresynth) is an electronic music microgenre that is based predominately on the music associated with action, science-fiction, and horror film soundtracks of the 1980s. Other influences are drawn from that decade's art and video games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core2Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-2400S or 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOX
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core2Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOX
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-2400S
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
